price: Kuri uyu musi rero, umuntu uwo ari we wese ahemberwa ivyo yarondeye kw’isi; impembo nziza ku ciza canke impembo mbi ku kibi. Kuri uyu musi rero, nta n’umwe arenganywa mu kurengerezwa urugero rw’ibihano canke mu kugabanywa indishi”. Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, Iranyarutsa mu guharurira no mu guhemba ibiremwa.
arabic: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡۚ لَا ظُلۡمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

meta.transliteration: al-yawma tuj'zā kullu nafsin bimā kasabat lā ẓul'ma al-yawma inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
